## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup
- **Electric mining drill** at (15.5, 70.5) - Extracts iron ore
- **Stone furnace** at (16.0, 74.0) - Smelts iron ore into plates
- **Burner inserter** at (16.5, 75.5) - Transfers plates from furnace to chest
- **Wooden chest** at (17.5, 75.5) - Stores smelted iron plates

### Power Generation Setup
- **Offshore pump** at (-9.5, -0.5) - Pumps water
- **Boiler** at (-6.0, -0.5) - Heats water into steam using coal
- **Steam engine** at (-0.5, -0.5) - Generates electricity from steam
- Connected pipe network between pump, boiler and engine
- Power network connected to iron mining drill

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement distance errors
- Move closer to target position before placing entities (max placement distance is 10 tiles)
- This occurred when trying to place mining drills and chests from too far away

### Entity collision errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones
- This occurred when trying to place a chest where an inserter already existed

### Connection errors
- Transport belts cannot connect directly to furnaces - use inserters as intermediaries
- This occurred when trying to connect furnace output directly to belt

### Undefined variable errors
- Ensure all referenced variables are properly defined before use
- This occurred when trying to connect power to undefined copper_drill and referencing undefined steam_engine

### Power system warnings
- The iron mining drill shows "output blocked" warning - needs output connection
- The furnace shows "no ingredients" warning - needs ore input
